could you help me? I can't install level 4 and 5 of German V3, it tells me I must update them.. what should I do? thanks in advance.
I have successfully installed Rosetta Stone V3 Levels 1-3, but when attempting to install Levels 4-5, I experience the same problem that Joe3W has encountered. Any suggestions?

In case anyone encounters the same error message that prevents you from installing levels 4 and 5 without updating Rosetta Stone, the solution is simple: follow the error message. Download and install Rosetta Stone 3.4.5 or 3.4.7, both of which have been uploaded by VasiaZozulia. Needless to say, these versions will update an older version of the program and allow you to install German L4 and L5 and so forth.
